name: Dimensional Rift
description:
Rips a hole in time and space, opening a random portal that damages your target:

Shadowy Tear
Deals 26,613 Shadow damage over 14 sec.

Unstable Tear
Deals 22,824 Chaos damage over 6 sec.

Chaos Tear
Fires a Chaos Bolt, dealing 8,597 Chaos damage. This Chaos Bolt always critically strikes and your critical strike chance increases its damage.

Generates 3 Soul Shard Fragments.
